task.title: Delete duplicate "Default" dashboards in RSA NetWitness versions 10.6.x & 11.x
task.shortdesc: There are duplicate "Default" dashboards in the RSA NetWitness UI.

taskbody.context: This task provides you with steps to remove any duplicate "Default" dashboards in the Dashboard section of the RSA NetWitness Platform UI.

step.cmd: Log into the RSA NetWitness UI.
Navigate to the Dashboards section of the UI.

ul.li: In 10.6.x: the "Dashboard" section is located in the top left corner of the UI.
In 11.x: the "Dashboard" section is located in Monitor > Overview.

step.cmd: Next to the words "Default Dashboard," there are icons regarding dashboard options.

ul.li: In between the "-" icon and the "Copy dashboard" icon, there is an icon with a red pencil.
Click the red pencil to show the dashboard editing options.
Click the option, "Restore Default Dashboard," which should clear all unnecessary/duplicate default dashboards.
In between the "-" icon and the "Copy dashboard" icon, there is an icon with a red pencil.
Click on that clockwise red arrow to "Restore Default Dashboards," which should clear all unnecessary/duplicate default dashboards.
